member.name: M:ComputationalNode.ComputationalNode.#ctor(ClusterUtils.ComponentConfig)
member.param: Server info from App.config and arguments.

member.name: M:ComputationalNode.ComputationalNode.ProcessPartialProblemsMessage(ClusterUtils.Communication.MessagePackage)
member.summary: Support for handling Partial Problems message. Node mocks working on partial problem and sends partial solution to server.
